mapper.select: SELECT t.UpdateTime, t.Action, tau. NAME Creator, CONCAT_WS( "ã€‚", GROUP_CONCAT(t.`FIELDS` SEPARATOR ','), GROUP_CONCAT( CONCAT(t.`BEFORE`, ',', t.`AFTER`) SEPARATOR ',' ) ) text FROM T_Common_Traces t, T_Auth_Users tau, T_CRM_Customers tcc WHERE t.creator = tau.GID AND tcc.GID=t.subscriberID AND tcc.ID=#{custId} GROUP BY t.UpdateTime, t.Action, t.Creator ORDER BY t.UpdateTime DESC

SELECT tau. NAME, tct.action, tct.creator, tct.createTime, cus. NAME AS customerName FROM T_Common_Traces tct LEFT JOIN T_CRM_Customers cus ON tct.SubscriberID = cus.ID LEFT JOIN T_Auth_Users tau ON tct.`Creator` = tau.id WHERE tct.SubscriberType = 'T_Common_Traces' AND (tct.ACTION = 0 OR tct.ACTION = 2) ORDER BY tct.CreateTime DESC LIMIT 6

SELECT tau.name,tct.action,tct.creator,tct.createTime,cus.Name as customerName FROM T_Common_Traces tct LEFT JOIN T_CRM_Customers cus ON tct.SubscriberID = cus.ID LEFT JOIN T_Auth_Users tau ON tct.`Creator` = tau.id WHERE tct.SubscriberType = 'T_Common_Traces' AND tct.creator = #{userId} ORDER BY tct.CreateTime DESC LIMIT 6
select u.`name` from T_Auth_Users u where GID=#{gid}
